channel.title: How do I stop shops opening if you aren't modified for silab's client?
channel.description:
Hi guys.
How do I stop shops from opening if you aren't modified for silabsoft's client? Is their something you can add, because I have needed this for ages.
Thanks.
~Musicmad441

item.title: How do I stop shops opening if you aren't modified for silab's client?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Where do I add this?

public boolean Silabs = true;

public void ClientSwitch() {
if (Silabs == true) {
[Silab shop shit]
}else if{
[noraml client shit]
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do I stop shops opening if you aren't modified for silab's client?

item.title: How do I stop shops opening if you aren't modified for silab's client?
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

use thsi[code]
public boolean Silabs = true;

public void ClientSwitch() {
if (Silabs == true) {
[Silab shop shit]
}else if{
[noraml client shit]
}[/code]

Then get a commad to doe this

else if (command.startsWith("Silabs")) { sendMessage("We now no you are using silabs"); Silabs = false; }
